pages.title: About
pages.text: 個資 賴昱錡 (Yu-Chi Lai) 臺大資工 B13 測試一下 LaTeX\LaTeXLATE​X，好欸可以耶 INFOR 35 th 網管 (Retired) 推 動漫/漫畫: 冰菓、不要欺負我，長瀞同學、膽大黨、葬送的芙莉蓮 Vtuber: Filian、Kobo Kanaeru、Hakui Koyori

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start Create a new post 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server 1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files 1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites 1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment 1234#include <stdio.h>int main() { printf("%s", "Goodbye, world!");}
